src:
The MMA Vivisection - UFC Moscow: Magomedsharipov vs. Kattar picks, odds, & analysis
07 Nov 2019, 20:00 by Zane Simon and Connor Ruebusch



There’s pretty much no way that any UFC card that had to follow UFC 244 could be something other than a come down. And to that end, UFC Moscow is appropriately under the radar with a night of decently well booked action, some interesting prospects, and a good top contenders bout to cap it all off—if not much else in the way of meaning. Should Zabit Magomedsharipov beat Calvin Kattar, it seems likely he’d get the next crack at the featherweight title.
And if you’re interested in diving deeper into the UFC Moscow undercard, check out our Prelims Vivi below:



The MMA Vivisection is brought to you by Combat Wombat, makers of combat sports themed artwork featuring MMA’s legendary fighters and legendary fights. Visit chrisrini.com for the latest pieces and commissions. Get your Combat Wombat themed Vivi t-shirts today! cottonbureau.com/products/dr-wombat
Here’s a look at the UFC Moscow fight card as it stands right now:
ESPN+ MAIN CARD | SATURDAY NOV. 9 - 2PM/11AM ET/PTZabit Magomedsharipov vs. Calvin Kattar - 7:25, Odds 23:45Alexander Volkov vs. Greg Hardy - 26:03, Odds 34:55Zelim Imadaev vs. Danny Roberts - 35:43, Odds 45:05Ed Herman vs. Khadis Ibragimov - 46:00, Odds 51:17Anthony Rocco Martin vs. Ramazan Emeev - 51:42Shamil Gamzatov vs. Klidson Abreu - 57:20, Odds 1:01:36
Watch ‘UFC ON ESPN + 21 - ‘MAGOMEDSHARIPOV VS KATTAR ’ Stream all the fights broadcast LIVE — don’t miss a single second of face-punching action! Plus, you get access to the best of the UFC Archives & more! SIGN UP NOW!
ESPN+ PRELIMS | 11AM/8AM ET/PTMagomed Ankalaev vs. Dalcha Lungiambula - 2:16, Odds 9:14Rustam Khabilov vs. Sergey Khandozhko - 9:55, Odds 17:45Roman Kopylov vs. Karl Roberson - 18:20, Odds 27:35Abubakar Nurmagomedov vs. David Zawada - 28:30, Odds 33:35Alexander Yakovlev vs. Roosevelt Roberts - 35:44, Odds 45:33Jessica-Rose Clark vs. Pannie Kianzad - 46:33, Odds 56:56Grigorli Popov vs. Davey Grant - 57:33, Odds 1:02:55
If you wish to catch the Main Card or Prelims shows on our Bloody Elbow Presents YouTube Channel your links are here:

If you enjoyed our show, give us a shout out in the comments here on Bloody Elbow, or give us a “like”, share & subscribe over on one of our other BE Presents Channels: SoundCloud, YouTube, iTunes & Apple TV, iHeartRadio, Stitcher, Spotify, Google Play, TuneIn, OverCast, or Player FM – whichever one happens to be your listening platform of choice.
